summary: ON ACCELERATING CAR WILL JERK /STUTTER AS IN NOT GO..THIS HAPPENS ALSO AFTER SLOWING TO GO THROUGH A DIP  THEN ACCELERATING TO GO AGAIN ,HAPPENS AFTER SLOWING TO MAKE A TURN .ALSO.HAPPENS WHEN ACCELERATING TO GO UP INCLINES SOMETIMES TO AS IF IT CAN'T DECIDE WHAT GEAR IT WANTS TO BE IN..MY CAR HAS  AN AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION ..SOMETIMES SCARED ME CAUSE WILL DO IT WHEN I'M PULLING INTO ON COMING TRAFFIC ..AND CAR WON'T GO.I HAVE CONTACTED SERVICE DEPT AT FORD AND THEY TOLD ME THIS YEAR VEHICLE WAS KNOWN FOR THIS ..I AGAIN HAVE SCHEDULED AN APPT FOR IT TO BE CHECKED ..THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON SINCE I FIRST ACQUIRED MY CAR IN AUG 31 2016 ...
